title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Join GTA+ for Benefits
content:
Join Grand Theft Auto Online's premium Membership program, delivering exclusive benefits and rewards to GTA+ Members each month, including GTA$500,000 and more. The following are included through September 4:

— The Benefactor Vorschlaghammer (Sedan)
— Access to the Vinewood Club Workshop
— 2X Rewards on Drag and Drift Races
— And more

GTA+ automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
